Message.Title: TOP IBM OFFICER/INSIDER SELLS $5,000,000,000.00 IN STOCK 2/8/13 (NEWS/ALERT)...
Message.Msg: IBM International Business Machines Corp Macdonald J Randall (Senior Vice President) Sale 10,596 201.57 2,135,793 13:24:51 2013-02-08 IBM International Business Machines Corp Macdonald J Randall (Senior Vice President) Sale 13,453 201.37 2,708,976 13:22:56 2013-02-08 IBM HAS BEEN BEHAVING VERY POORLY FOR THE PAST 2 YEARS, EVER SINCE BUFFET BOUGHT A POSITION IN THIS STOCK. BUFFET IS LIKE A HEX ON TECH STOCKS. HE HASN'T A CLUE ABOUT TECH AS HE'S OPENLY ADMITTED TO HIS SHAREHOLDERS. OBVIOUSLY WITH IBM GOING NOWHERE FOR OVER 2 YEARS!!! AND PEOPLE PRAISE BUFFET AS BEING SOME SORT OF STOCK INVESTOR GENIUS, LOL! IT COULDN'T BE MORE FALSE. HE HAS SCREWED UP WITH 41% OF HIS TRADES/INVESTMENTS. I HAVE KEPT TRACK OF HIS TRACK RECORD, GOING BACK 17 YEARS. THE PRESS AND MEDIA ARE CLUELESS FOR TREATING THIS GUY AS IF HE'S THE SMARTEST MAN ON WALL STREET, AND AS IF EVERYTHING HE TOUCHES TURNS TO GOLD. COULDN'T BE FURTHER FROM THE TRUTH. IBM IS JUST ANOTHER ADDITION TO THE LIST OF FAILED TRADES THAT HE STICKS WITH FAR LONGER THAN HE SHOULD. THIS STOCK SHOULD HAVE BEEN DUMPED A YEAR AGO. WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR BUFFET? SOMEONE TO RING A BELL AND SEND A BLIMP OVER YOUR OFFICE IN OMAHA TELEGRAPHING YOU TO SELL?
